ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We acknowledge the many contributors to the NSB database. We thank Tom Ezard and Dave Lazarus for comments on earlier versions of this manuscript. Thanks to John Alroy for sharing his SQS 4.3 script and to RaphaÃ«l Morard for assistance with TARA Oceans data. Open Access was supported by the University of Bergen. Wolfgang Kiessling and two anonymous referees provided helpful comments that improved the manuscript.
